title: Arthur Masuaku produces skill-of-the-season contender against Tottenham
description: Arthur Masuaku produced an obscene piece of skill to get past two Tottenham players in West Hamâ€™s 1-1 draw at Wembley.
content: Receiving the ball on the left flank in the second half and seemingly running in a cul-de-sac, the 24-year-old left-back managed to get past Spurs pair Serge Aurier and Heung-Min Son with an outrageous flick.The Frenchman lifted the ball up with his right boot, before wrapping his left around Aurier's body and flicking the ball past the Ivory Coast international and breaking free into the Spurs box.He then poked the ball into the area for Andre Ayew, inadvertently nutmegging Spurs midfielder Christian Eriksen, before Ayew's effort was blocked by Hugo Lloris for a corner.The match ended 1-1 at Wembley after Pedro Obiang's stunning opener was cancelled out by Son late on.Watch the obscene skill in the video above
